column4: KY-627 (Boonesborough Rd) in the area of Fort Boonesborough State Park in Madison Co
column5: The roadway is shutdown in both directions until further notice due to a collision.  Motorists traveling between Madison Co and Clark Co should use I-75 and I-64.

column4: New Circle Rd at Trade Center Dr
column5: The left lanes are blocked in both directions.

column4: Inbound Tates Creek Rd just past Old Mt Tabor Rd
column5: Three vehicles.  One lane is reportedly blocked.
